name: Summoner
description: In the midst of chaos, there is opportunity.

name: Boom Brothers
description: A rather devastating duo

name: Nomad
description: Swift in life, swift in death.

name: Enforcer
description: Anything you want done, with menace.

name: Rageclaws
description: Anger is a justifiable response.

name: Fire Dragon
description: Fire dragons erupt in flames from the womb.

description: Born of lava and anger.

name: Scavenger
description: Who's a good boy?

name: Batariel
description: Hell is missing their employee of the month.

name: Burning Spears
description: Upgrade cattle prods are effective weapons.

name: Fire Stalker
description: Like their prey charred, very charred.

description: The worm riders are a very original idea.

description: Immolation by request.

name: Firesworn
description: Cannon fodder.

description: The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

description: Suprisingly affectionate parental figures.

description: Scientists remain uncertain on their sentiency.

name: Magma Turret
description: Prone to self-destruct at a moments notice.

name: Moloch
description: Moloch is named after the first city he razed.

description: The first of a brood to ignite torches the rest.

description: Their warped minds know only the flame.

name: Vulcan
description: Born from the unholy sacrifice of 3 innocents.
